Banner.Description: Highly experienced software developer with 3 years of experience in developing and delivering software solutions using Typescript, Java, Python, Spring, Quarkus, gRPC. Proficient in Angular for front-end development and implementing OIDC integrations with Keycloak. Skilled in Agile/SCRUM methodologies. Technical skills include HTML, SCSS, Maven, Git, and IDEs such as IntelliJ, Eclipse, and Visual Studio Code. Experienced in Databricks pyspark, Azure DevOps, CI/CD pipelines. Excellent critical thinking, ability to work in a fast-paced environment, and a collaborative team player with strong communication skills. Proven track record of delivering high-quality software solutions.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In my 3 years as a developer, I seek to train every day. I have worked writing unit tests, performing continuous integration, and covering backend developer roles with Quarkus, Spring, MongoDB and Postgres. I have led teams having empathy, exercising motivation to partners, and setting plans and goals together.
My skills also include implementing system improvements, optimizing sites, standardizing patterns, and suggesting and executing ideas that add value to the project I'm working on.
Some of the technologies that I have trained and worked on include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Senior Programmer Analyst
Description: Developed and maintained a web-based application using Angular, Quarkus, and Postgres, resulting in improved user experience and increased performance.
Designed and implemented RESTful APIs to support multiple applications, using Java 17  and Quarkus .
Contributed in building user interfaces for a web app that focuses on instrument integrations, increasing communication and collaboration among team members.
Implementation of continuous integration and continuous deployment for Databricks notebooks using Azure Devops Pipelines
Leading a team of 4 people in the development of a Instrument Integrations  platform made in Angular, Quarkus, and Postgres.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Intern
Description: Worked on Embedded System, IoT operations and integrated different components writing programs in c
Planning and team work coordinating and completing work on time

FeatureProjects.Title: Projects that I was a part of
FeatureProjects.Label: Web based product

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Instruments Integration
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Provides solution for data integrity challenges of Life Sciences laboratories, configurable roles , permissions, and user management. Able to configure workflows based on different bussness needs in the system

OtherProjects.Title: More personal projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Warp
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Warp is an ongoing angular project I am working on to explore on how user authentication can be made secure and reliable

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Java Features
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: This is a small work done on exploring some coolest features in Java that was introduced from version 9 to version 17 . Stay tuned for more updates on this

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message. Simple one-page design that features a profile letter with basic information about a person.
